cards.caption: Anyone can write a completely custom Ghost theme with some solid knowledge of HTML and CSS

sections: Ghost comes with a beautiful default theme called Casper, which is designed to be a clean, readable publication layout and can be adapted for most purposes. However, Ghost can also be completely themed to suit your needs. Rather than just giving you a few basic settings which act as a poor proxy for code, we just let you write code.
There are a huge range of both free and premium pre-built themes which you can get from the
, or you can create your own from scratch.
Ghost themes are written with a templating language called handlebars, which has a set of dynamic helpers to insert your data into template files. For example:
outputs the name of the current author.
The best way to learn how to write your own Ghost theme is to have a look at
, which is heavily commented and should give you a sense of how everything fits together.
